title: Refried Popeye's (A.K.A. Extra Crispy Popeye's Fried Chicken) Recipe
full_text:
Refried Popeye's (A.K.A. Extra Crispy Popeye's Fried Chicken) Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Cook
15 mins
Active
15 mins
Chilling Time
8 hrs
Total
8 hrs 15 mins
Serves
4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
Family-size pack
fried chicken
, preferably from Popeye's
1
quart
vegetable oil
Directions
Refrigerate fried chicken overnight. The next day, heat oil in a large dutch oven, wok, or chicken fryer to 350°F. Carefully add half the chicken, or as much as can comfortably fit in a single layer. Cook, turning frequently until re-crisped and heated through. Transfer to a large plate lined with paper towels. Repeat with remaining chicken. Serve immediately.
